docblock.description: Contains the Chadicus\Marvel\Api\ArrayCache class
Concrete implementation of Cache using an array.
The maximum ttl for cached responses (24 hours).
Default time to live in seconds.
Array containing the cached responses.
Construct a new instance of ArrayCache.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The default time to live in seconds.

tag.name: throws
tag.description: Throw if $defaultTimeToLive is not an integer between 0 and 86400.

docblock.description: Store the api $response as the cached result of the api $request.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The request for which the response will be cached.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The reponse to cache.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The time in seconds that the cache should live.

tag.name: throws
tag.description: Throw if $timeToLive is not an integer between 0 and 86400.

docblock.description: Retrieve the cached results of the api $request.

tag.name: param
tag.description: A request for which the response may be cached.

docblock.description: Class for iterating index response to the Marvel API. Collections are readonly.
API Client.
Limit to give to API.
Offset to give to API.
Resource name for collection.
Array of filters to pass to API.
Total number of elements in the collection.
Pointer in the paginated results.
A paginated set of elements from the API.
Create a new collection.

tag.name: param
tag.description: A client connection to the API.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The name of API resource to request.

tag.name: param
tag.description: A key value pair array of search filters.

docblock.description: Return the count elements in this collection, @see Countable::count().
Rewind the Iterator to the first element, @see Iterator::rewind().
Return the key of the current element, @see Iterator::key().
Checks if current position is valid, @see Iterator::valid().
Move forward to next element, @see Iterator::next().
Return the current element, @see Iterator::current().
